title: Sunday Brunch - A Benefit for Camp Lightbulb
desc: Camp Lightbulb  is a summer camp for LGBTQ youth launched in Provincetown, MA in 2011. It serves LGBTQ youth by providing a?magical summer camp experience at a crucial time in their young adulthood in a fun-filled, inclusive environment.? Camp Lightbulb is now expanding across the Atlantic with the aim of supporting exchanges between campers in the UK and US and the aim of bringing Camp Lightbulb to London in the near future.  Please join us at the  Hoxton Grill  at the Hoxton Hotel in Shoreditch on? Sunday, November 15 ,?from? 12:30 to 2:30pm  (welcome to stay around after),?for a? Sunday ?Brunch to celebrate the growth of Camp Lightbulb and find out how you can be a part of our journey.  Your ticket includes brunch and a  hosted bar  (bottomless Mimosa's and Bloody Mary's will be on tap), but more importantly, your ticket and any additional donation made will benefit directly the kids who make Camp Lightbulb what it is today ?  a one of a kind LGBTQ youth experience .
